tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockFeed(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  feed_name VARCHAR(50),
  feed_quantity FLOAT,
  feeding_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE feed_plan (
  feed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  feed_type VARCHAR(50),
  protein_content DECIMAL(5,2),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE nutrition_plan (
  nutrition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nutrition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  minerals VARCHAR(100),
  vitamins VARCHAR(100),
  calorie_content DECIMAL(6,2)
);
CREATE TABLE livestock_feed (    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    ingredient VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,    quantity DECIMAL NOT NULL,    feeding_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE nutrition_plans (    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    target_weight DECIMAL NOT NULL,    calorie_requirements DECIMAL NOT NULL,    protein_requirements DECIMAL NOT NULL,    plan_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE feed_records (    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    livestock_id INTEGER NOT NULL,    feed_id INTEGER NOT NULL,    feed_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,    quantity_given DECIMAL NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    species VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Feed (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    nutrients VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE NutritionPlan (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    description VARCHAR(100),
    target_species VARCHAR(50),
    required_nutrients VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE FeedingSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    feed_id INT,
    feeding_time TIME,
    amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE livestock_feed (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
protein_content FLOAT,
fat_content FLOAT,
fiber_content FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE livestock_animals (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
weight FLOAT,
age INT,
species VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE feed_inventory (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
feed_name VARCHAR(50),
quantity INT,
price_per_unit FLOAT,
expiry_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE feeding_schedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
animal_id INT,
feed_id INT,
feeding_time TIMESTAMP,
quantity FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE feed_nutritional_info (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
feed_id INT,
protein_content FLOAT,
fat_content FLOAT,
fiber_content FLOAT);
